title: Mystery figure

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mystery figures are champions of various races that have come from all over Gielinor to fight in the Champions' Guild, as part of the Champion's Challenge minigame. They cannot be spoken to, or interacted with in anyway (except for the human, which can be fought). They are members of six different races:

Mystery figures are champions of various races that have come from all over Gielinor to fight in the Champions' Guild, as part of the Champion's Challenge minigame. They cannot be spoken to, or interacted with in anyway (except for the human, which can be fought). They are members of six different races:

  • Humans
  • Dwarves
  • Elves
  • Gnomes
  • Werewolves
  • Tzhaar

Of them, only the Human Champion, Leon d'Cour, is fightable, and only after all of the lower champions have been defeated as part of the mini-game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Like Leon d'Cour, the dwarf and TzHaar champions have models for being unseated with their weapons equipped. However, as they cannot currently be fought, they are not currently used in-game, leaving these models unused within the game files. Their weapons can normally be seen lying next to their chairs.
